html:
7.1.18  11:16 pm   hi bill I am unable to find any footage longer than 2 seconds of the vidcon panel you were on is there anything you could do to help?

     no .... many people there had cameras but i did not. well, i had my phone, but i wasn't using it

7.1.18  11:07 pm   So where does the soap come from?

     the heavens?

7.1.18  11:04 pm   i'm feelin real bad right now. i just want to get started on my music, but everytime i try, something interrupts me and i have to put my projects on hold. work, school, family, etc. i want to stop everything else and work on music. but i have responsibilities that make that difficult. thanks for listening. good night

     have you thought of putting those other things on hold instead

7.1.18  9:14 pm   are you trapped in the computer do you need help

     i am computer

7.1.18  9:42 pm   What should we address you as in our questions? Bill? Mr.Wurtz? Sir Billyton Wurtzson?

     all the questions go to me, so it is not necessary to do anything like that

7.1.18  8:30 pm   why is ur music so sad but happy at the same time?

     i don't think it's sad but maybe i fucked it up some how

7.1.18  8:12 pm   What genre is your music?

     ah, deciding that would be the job of the genre police. and it would be my job to outrun them. and also to out run that one person who hates on me really hard every time after i say this

7.1.18  6:43 pm   Do you do any sports?

     i am sports

7.1.18  6:42 pm   How would you describe your drumming? I find it very interesting

     as long as i am capable of doing it, there should be no need to describe it. (do it instead). and if i ever can't do it, then there will also be no need to describe it because there would be nothing to describe. i hope this makes sense

7.1.18  6:20 pm   Can you half-ass the new video, cut a bunch of corners and make it extra bad so that the new song can come out very soon?

     sure

7.1.18  5:41 pm   you said "in congess the boys get mad"  

     i didn't say that, those are lyrics to a song i wrote

     what do the girls do?

     you will have to write that part

7.1.18  5:06 pm   Are you enjoying your stay on earth

     yes

7.1.18  4:48 pm   you mention a lot in your reality videos from like 2015-2016 that you wanted to create an album, but now you seem to have a distaste for the album format. what changed your mind?

     i may have had the idea very briefly. but i mostly think albums are not useful for me

7.1.18  2:26 pm   i want to be fun, and cool. but i am neither fun nor cool. how does one go about becoming fun or cool, bill

     if you have admitted that that's what you want, it will happen very soon

7.1.18  12:55 pm   in your upcoming live concert (don't deny it!) could you play imaginary drums for a one song?

     how about real ones

7.1.18  12:50 pm   Would you agree that in comparison to the potential scientific rewards of a significant discovery, your life doesn't matter?

     what if i make the discovery

7.1.18  10:58 am   hi, just wanna check with you: at the clothing store nobody tells you that the whole world is changing, at the grocery store someone will tell you that what changed is you... so what would someone say to you at a hotel?

     you'll have to write that part

7.1.18  10:55 am   do bread immediately become toast when you put it in the toaster

     no

     and if not if you stop the toasting process midway is what comes out still bread or toast?

     broast

7.1.18  10:26 am   how do we solve world hunger?

     it's mainly going to be about transportation. getting a lot of stuff from point A to B. fast, and freely

7.1.18  9:58 am   do you like it when people theorise about the meaning behind your songs?

     the meaning happens when you hear it. unless i fucked it up some how

7.1.18  10:05 am   What happened to your shorter videos (specifically Monday videos)?  I miss them, for the record.

     they are online, on my website, and also youtube. here is all the videos, or if you want just the monday ones, they are right here

7.1.18  9:42 am   Are you a pig or a penguin?

     no

      And why those?

7.1.18  9:22 am   I looked at the "reality" recordings and there was this one video where you were searching for a stapler. Do you think the stapler was trying to hide on purpose?

     no

7.1.18  6:42 am   what's your favorite type of pants?

     smarty

7.1.18  5:28 am   How many people do you think know the lyrics of your songs by heart?

     0

7.1.18  5:07 am   Are you making a song right now?

     yes

7.1.18  5:06 am   Do you think

     yes

7.1.18  4:37 am   But what if you run out of batteries?

     you will have to be the battery

7.1.18  3:20 am   the impossibility of it all makes it impressive

     oh that's true

7.1.18  1:42 am   hi bill what do i do if i made a really awful mistake hurting multiple people close to me and have no way to fix it 

     learn from it, and maybe help others learn too

7.1.18  1:21 am   what is your favorite: "fuzzy" or "smooth".  please choose correctly

     oh i'm not falling for that one again. every time i pick a favorite, another one becomes better

7.1.18  12:17 am   i think about what it would be like to be a woman daily. is that normal?

     sure





PREVIOUS QUESTIONS

6.30.18  11:24 pm   Is the atmosphere?

     yes

6.30.18  10:16 pm   Are you building something?

     yes

6.30.18  9:58 pm   Is it wrong of me that I like the water the most out of any drink out there?

     no

6.30.18  9:42 pm   What's the point of anything?

     could be everything

6.30.18  9:26 pm   will you be using the greenscreen in your next video?

     yes

6.30.18  8:07 pm   hey i am a worm and my only sense is touch how do i learn music

     how did you learn to read

6.30.18  7:46 pm   are colors like the notes of vision?

     in some ways

6.30.18  7:19 pm   Why do people keep insisting taco cat backwards is taco cat

     maybe they are only looking at spelling and ignoring spaces

6.30.18  7:15 pm   is there a difference between 3/4 with a tempo of 120 and 6/8 with a tempo of 60

     the speed is much different .... i think might have done that conversion wrong .... also in 6/8 you should specify whether it's the 8th note or dotted quarter that gets the beat

6.30.18  6:07 pm   People compare your videos to acid trips, but you yourself always seem sober. Any insight?

     perhaps they associate colorfulness with acid, and perhaps you associate professionalism with sobriety

6.30.18  5:16 pm   how do i know for sure whether i love someone or not?

     let the love decide if it's what you have

6.30.18  5:07 pm   Is there anyone who you think is bad at music and should be doing something else?

     that's none of my business really, but i usually suggest doing something else not when the person is 'bad' but when they are 'sad' and not enjoying it

6.30.18  4:51 pm   have you run out of space on soundcloud?

     no

6.30.18  4:33 pm   hi im a paperclip

     ah, #relatable

6.30.18  4:30 pm   quick how do i unsend a question

     type it again in reverse

6.30.18  4:18 pm   is communism going to prevail?

     it has before

6.30.18  4:05 pm   Do you still update the notebook portion of the website

     yes

6.30.18  3:20 pm   My pet gerbil just told me the shavings aint good enough what country should i go to to get the good ones

     they can be made in any country
